Description of incident: "Cici's Pizza,  an American fast food business based in Coppell, Texas with more than  500 stores in 35 states, appears to be the latest restaurant chain to  struggle with a credit card breach. The data available so far suggests  that hackers obtained access to card data at affected restaurants by  posing as technical support specialists for the company’s point-of-sale  provider, and that multiple other retailers have been targeted by this  same cybercrime gang."More Information: http://krebsonsecurity.com/2016/06/banks-credit-card-breach-at-cicis-pizza/
